staticText.text: P.O BOX 1233 BOROKO NATIONAL CAPITAL DISTRICT PAPUA NEW GUINEA PH: +675 302 5800 FAX: +675 323 3336

Condition of Sale : Courts (PNG) Limited reserves the following rights to the goods until all accounts owed by the Buyer to the Vendor are paid in full : 1. Legal ownership of the goods. 2. To enter into the Buyer's premises where the goods are located and re-possess of the goods without liability for trespass. 3. Take any action necessary to recover loss or damage caused by the failure of Buyer to pay for the goods.

Please pay directly to our bank account number :
Commercial Center, Gordon, NCD
Account: 1000-490283
